function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Site engineers and surveyors forced to work from home due to COVID-19 lockdown rules","Impact":"Delays in project completion due to inability to conduct works on site","Mitigation":"Implement remote surveying and project management technologies, prioritize low-risk personnel for on-site work, and enforce strict health and safety protocols for on-site workers","Technologies":"Remote surveying tools, project management software, and health monitoring technologies","People":"Site engineers, surveyors, and construction project personnel","Owner":"Construction project managers and health and safety officers"},{"Description":"Difficulty in providing required services due to high-risk personnel unable to conduct on-site work","Impact":"Inability to address critical project tasks and potential delays in project timelines","Mitigation":"Implement backup plans and protocols for task delegation, provide training for alternate personnel, and use remote support technologies for high-risk personnel","Technologies":"Remote support tools and training modules for alternate personnel","People":"Project managers, high-risk personnel, and support staff","Owner":"Construction project managers and health and safety officers"},{"Description":"High-risk personnel unwilling to risk their health to conduct critical surveying tasks on-site","Impact":"Inability to complete critical surveying tasks, potential safety risks, and project delays","Mitigation":"Provide alternative methods for surveying tasks, prioritize low-risk personnel for on-site tasks, and enforce strict health and safety protocols for on-site work","Technologies":"Remote surveying tools, virtual reality modeling, and health monitoring technologies","People":"High-risk personnel, project managers, and health and safety officers","Owner":"Construction project managers and health and safety officers"}]}
